channel.title: Server hosting help?
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm pretty new to MoparScape.org/Smf. And i was wondering, i have Wireless internet connection, how can i host my server? is there a way to do it without Hamachi? if yes, please explain how i can do it.
If not, thanks anyway for your help.
Greetings, yB. ;D

item.title: Server hosting help?
item.dc:creator: @yB1 yB
item.description:
@yB1 wrote:

Ok, Thug get out of this topic, u didn’t answer on my question at all.
Next: Atleast Xx tried,
All other thanks who helped me, gonna try port forwarding now.

Greetings,
YB

Read full topic

item.title: Server hosting help?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Dear fucktwats that said he couldn’t host a server: no.

yB: Yes you can host a server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 09:45:12 AM[/size][hr][quote=“xXx gl0wi xXx, post:7, topic:218921”]How would you portforward to a wireless router:o[/quote]
Port forwarding to wireless IS THE SAME AS PORT FORWARDING TO ETHERNET CONNECTION.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hosting help?
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

Thug. Please shut up He was right. that wasnt the question so that means u kinda spammed[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2008, 06:43:54 AM[/size][hr][quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:218924”]xXx gl0wi xXx was wrong. My old server was hosted wirelessly, and my webserver I’m running now is using wireless. You just have to do portforwarding to your wireless address.[/quote]

How would you portforward to a wireless router:o

there is open up hamachi create a network and the ip that comes up put it in for server ip and ur done
[/quote]

That wasn’t the Question, I asked if there were other ways.

@ xXx gl0wi xXx, thank you for your answer.

Moderators/Admins, this topic can be Locked.[/quote]
